ssot__AuthorizationFormText__dlm.name: Authorization Form Text
ssot__AuthorizationFormText__dlm.description: The Authorization Form Text DMO represents an authorization form's text and language settings.

ssot__AuthorizationFormId__c.description: A reference ID to set of terms and conditions (such as privacy policy, contract, and consent form), including version numbers and associated references to external documents.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as primary key for the Authorization Form Text DMO.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID for an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the data record.

ssot__LocaleId__c.description: A reference ID to range of longitudes where common standard time is used.

ssot__VersionNumber__c.description: An edition or variant of the authorization form text.
